name: SVGGradientElement
description: The SVGGradient interface is a base interface used by SVGLinearGradientElement and SVGRadialGradientElement.

members.name: SVGGradientElement.gradientUnits
members.description: Returns an SVGAnimatedEnumeration corresponding to the gradientUnits attribute on the given element. Takes one of the constants defined in SVGUnitTypes.

members.name: SVGGradientElement.gradientTransform
members.description: Returns an SVGAnimatedTransformList corresponding to attribute gradientTransform on the given element.

members.name: SVGGradientElement.spreadMethod
members.description: Returns an SVGAnimatedEnumeration corresponding to attribute spreadMethod on the given element. One of the spread method types defined on this interface.
